about.description:
Solves convex cone programs via operator splitting.
Can solve: linear programs (LPs), second-order cone programs (SOCPs),
semidefinite programs (SDPs), exponential cone programs (ECPs),
and power cone programs (PCPs), or problems with any combination of
those cones.
about.summary: Python interface for SCS, which solves convex cone problems

name: scs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "scs" %}
{% set version = "2.1.1-2" %}
{% set sha256 = "f816cfe3d4b4cff3ac2b8b96588c5960ddd2a3dc946bda6b09db04e7bc6577f2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: "{{ version|replace('-', '.') }}"  # 2.1.1-2 => 2.1.1.2

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 1
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
  skip: true  # [win and py==27]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
  host:
    - libblas
    - liblapack
    - python
    - setuptools
    - pip
    - numpy
  run:
    - python
    - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
    - scipy >=0.13.2

test:
  imports:
    - scs
    - _scs_direct
    - _scs_indirect
  requires:
    - nose
  source_files:
    - test/
  commands:
    - nosetests test

about:
  home: https://github.com/bodono/scs-python
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Python interface for SCS, which solves convex cone problems'
  description: |
    Solves convex cone programs via operator splitting.
    Can solve: linear programs (LPs), second-order cone programs (SOCPs),
    semidefinite programs (SDPs), exponential cone programs (ECPs),
    and power cone programs (PCPs), or problems with any combination of
    those cones.
  doc_url: https://github.com/bodono/scs-python
  dev_url: https://github.com/bodono/scs-python

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dougalsutherland
    - mcg1969
